article.class: et_pb_post post-1641 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-category

ul.li: Bachelor of Arts or Science Degree
Valid Ohio teaching certificate or license in appropriate teaching area
Successful completion of FBI/BCI criminal records check
Ability to establish and maintain effective working relationships with all employees

div.p: Salary is competitive and commensurate with experience, includes comprehensive benefits.

ul.li: Required license/certification: Active ODE Teaching credential (Intervention Specialist K-12)

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_cta_0 et_hover_enabled et_pb_promo et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_no_bg

div.p:
Two Easton Oval, Ste 525
Columbus, OH 43219

Our Academies do not discriminate based on race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding non-discrimination policies.
Jesse Truett, Chief of Staff ~ Two Easton Oval, Ste 525 ~ Columbus, OH 43219 ~ 614-512-2151
